info.title: Nursing App API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the Nursing App - A platform connecting users with nursing services

get.description: Retrieve the about us information. Available to both users and admins.

description.example: We provide professional nursing care services

put.description: Update the about us information. Only accessible by admins.

description.example: We provide professional nursing care services
We provide professional nursing care services

get.description: Retrieve all popups for admin management. Accessible only to administrators.

content.example: We are excited to announce our new features...

post.description: Create a new popup with image upload and scheduling options. Accessible only to administrators.

image.description: Popup image file (JPG, JPEG, PNG, max 2MB)

content.example: We are excited to announce our new features and improvements.

get.description: Retrieve a specific popup by ID. Accessible only to administrators.

put.description: Update an existing popup. Image upload is optional. Accessible only to administrators.

image.description: New popup image file (optional, JPG, JPEG, PNG, max 2MB)

delete.description: Delete a popup and its associated image from Firebase. Accessible only to administrators.

get.description: Retrieve all sliders for admin management. Accessible only to administrators.

post.description: Create a new slider with image upload. Accessible only to administrators.

image.description: Slider image file (JPG, JPEG, PNG, max 2MB)

get.description: Retrieve a specific slider by ID. Accessible only to administrators.

put.description: Update an existing slider. Image upload is optional. Accessible only to administrators.

image.description: New slider image file (optional, JPG, JPEG, PNG, max 2MB)

delete.description: Delete a slider and its associated image from Firebase. Accessible only to administrators.

get.summary: Get active popup for app launch
get.description: Retrieve the currently active popup for app opening. Returns the most recent active popup where start_date is null or <= now, end_date is null or > now, and is_active = true. Accessible to both users and admins.

200.description: Active popup retrieved successfully or no active popup available

image.description: Firebase Storage URL for popup image

content.example: We are excited to announce our new features...

get.description: Retrieve all active sliders ordered by position for homepage display. Accessible to both users and admins.

image.description: Firebase Storage URL for slider image

post.description: Register a new user with name, email, phone number, and password. Sends OTP via WhatsApp for verification.

message.example: User registered successfully. Please check your WhatsApp for the OTP.

error.example: Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

post.description: Verify the OTP sent to user's phone number via WhatsApp/SMS
Authenticate user with email and password

message.example: Your phone number is not verified.

post.description: Logout user and invalidate current token
Send OTP to user's phone number for password reset

message.example: OTP sent successfully. Please check your phone.
User with this phone number does not exist.
Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

post.description: Reset user password using OTP verification
Resend OTP verification code to user's phone number

message.example: User with this phone number does not exist.
Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories. Available to both users and admins.

image_url.description: Firebase Storage URL for category image

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific category. Available to both users and admins.

image_url.description: Firebase Storage URL for category image

post.description: Create a new category with optional image. Only accessible by admins. If image upload fails, a 422 error is returned with a message.

422.description: Validation error or failed image upload

put.description: Update a category's information. Only accessible by admins.

delete.description: Delete a category from the system. Cannot delete if it has associated services. Only accessible by admins.

400.description: Cannot delete category with associated services

message.example: Cannot delete category with associated services.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all notifications for the authenticated user.

post.description: Mark a specific notification as read for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Delete a specific notification for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all nurses. Available to both users and admins.

post.description: Create a new nurse account. Only accessible by admins.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific nurse including ratings. Available to both users and admins.

put.description: Update a nurse's information. Only accessible by admins.

delete.description: Delete a nurse from the system. Only accessible by admins.

post.description: Submit a rating and comment for a nurse. Only accessible by users.

message.example: You have already rated this nurse.

get.description: Retrieve all requests with comprehensive order tracking. Users see only their own requests, admins see all requests. Latitude/longitude come from user location info, time_needed_to_arrive is cached and decreases over time.

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

status.description: 4-stage order tracking: submitted  assigned  in_progress  completed

latitude.description: From user location info, not stored in requests table

longitude.description: From user location info, not stored in requests table

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Cached time in minutes, decreases over time, auto-updates status to in_progress when reaches 0

post.description: Create a new service request. Only accessible by users.

full_name.description: Full name of the person needing care

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent
Need nursing care for elderly parent

get.summary: Get request details with order tracking
get.description: Retrieve details of a specific request with 4-stage order tracking. Users can only view their own requests, admins can view any request. Real-time time_needed_to_arrive countdown and automatic status progression.

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Live countdown in minutes, auto-triggers status change to in_progress when reaches 0

put.description: Update a request. Only accessible by admins.

full_name.description: Full name of the person needing care

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Time in minutes needed to arrive

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

delete.description: Soft delete a request. The request is removed from admin view but remains available to users. Only accessible by admins.

message.example: Request removed from admin view, but still available to users.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all services. Available to both users and admins.

post.description: Create a new service. Only accessible by admins.

discount_price.description: Discounted price (must be less than regular price)

service_pic.description: URL to service picture (stored as URL string, not file upload)

category_id.description: Category ID (REQUIRED - must be valid category)

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific service. Available to both users and admins.

put.description: Update a service's information. Only accessible by admins.

discount_price.description: Discounted price (must be less than regular price)

service_pic.description: URL to service picture (stored as URL string, not file upload)

category_id.description: Category ID (must be valid category if provided)

delete.description: Delete a service from the system. Only accessible by admins.

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information
Retrieve a specific user's details by ID. Only accessible by admins.

put.description: Update user profile information. Users can only update their own profile, admins can update any user.

get.description: Retrieve user dashboard with active requests count and recent services

post.summary: Submit user location on first login
post.description: Submit user's location coordinates on first login. Can only be called once per user.

get.description: Retrieve admin dashboard with system statistics
Retrieve a list of all users in the system. Only accessible by admins.

post.description: Create a new user account. Only accessible by admins.

role_id.description: User role ID (optional, defaults to user)

delete.description: Delete a user account from the system. Only accessible by admins.
